content:
Here are 25 more risks:

| Name of Risk | Explanation of What Can Go Wrong | Tasks to Lower the Risk | Risk Severity (1-10) | Category |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Basement Flooding | Water damage caused by basement flooding | Inspect basement for leaks and cracks, clean gutters and downspouts, and install sump pump | 9 | Landscaping and Drainage |
| Sewer Backup | Sewage backup into the home | Install backwater valve, flush drains regularly, and properly dispose of grease and other waste | 8 | Plumbing |
| Roof Collapse | Roof collapsing due to too much weight | Clear roof of snow and ice, and trim trees near the house | 9 | Roofing and Gutters |
| Gas Leak | Gas leak leading to explosion or fire | Install carbon monoxide detectors, maintain gas appliances, and turn off gas if you suspect a leak | 10 | HVAC |
| Mold | Mold growth causing respiratory issues and damage to home | Control humidity levels, fix leaks, and clean bathroom and kitchen regularly | 7 | Insulation and Weatherproofing |
| Carbon Monoxide Poisoning | Carbon monoxide poisoning from faulty heating system | Install carbon monoxide detectors, maintain heating system, and properly ventilate the home | 10 | HVAC |
| Tree Damage | Tree falling or branches falling causing property damage | Trim trees regularly and remove any dead or weak trees | 8 | Exterior Maintenance |
| Chimney Fire | Fire in the chimney due to buildup of creosote | Inspect and clean chimney annually, and only burn dry, seasoned wood | 9 | Fire Prevention |
| Electrical Fire | Fire caused by electrical system issues | Update wiring and electrical components as needed, and only use approved electrical equipment | 9 | Electrical |
| Hail Damage | Hail damaging roof and exterior of home | Inspect roof and exterior after every hailstorm, and install hail-resistant roofing materials | 7 | Roofing and Gutters |
| Burst Pipes | Pipes bursting due to freezing temperatures | Insulate pipes, leave faucets dripping, and set thermostat at a consistent temperature | 9 | Plumbing |
| Ice Dams | Ice damming causing water damage | Install insulation and ventilation, and remove snow and ice from roof | 8 | Roofing and Gutters |
| Wildfires | Wildfire causing damage to property | Create defensible space around home, and clear dead plants and trees from yard | 10 | Exterior Maintenance |
| Clogged Gutters | Clogged gutters leading to water damage | Clean gutters and downspouts regularly, and install gutter guards | 8 | Roofing and Gutters |
| Rodent Infestation | Infestation of rodents causing damage to home | Seal entry points, store food properly, and use traps or baits to control rodents | 7 | Pest Control |
| Slip and Falls | Injury due to slippery surfaces or tripping hazards | Fix loose or uneven flooring, and keep walkways clear of debris and snow/ice | 6 | Interior Maintenance |
| Frozen Pipes | Pipes freezing and bursting | Insulate pipes, leave faucets dripping, and set thermostat at a consistent temperature | 9 | Plumbing |
| Water Heater Leak | Water heater leak causing water damage | Inspect water heater regularly, and replace when necessary | 7 | HVAC |
| Dryer Vent Fire | Fire caused by buildup of lint in dryer vent | Clean lint filter and dryer vent regularly, and replace flexible venting material with metal | 8 | Fire Prevention |
| Inadequate Home Insurance | Inadequate coverage in the event of damage or loss | Regularly review and update home insurance policy | 10 | Other |
